Docs.summary: Stores the font format attributes. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat> class is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter> class.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of . This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor looks first to the given style for the values of <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Bold%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Italic%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Size%2A>. If any of the corresponding properties of the `style` are <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption.NotSet>, this constructor looks to the corresponding properties of the `currentFormat` parameter.

Sets or returns whether the font is bold. The default value is . This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Docs.value: if the font is bold; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlFormat.Bold%2A> property takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BooleanOption> enumeration, not a Boolean value.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the font is italic. The default value is . This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Must be of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize>. The default value is <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize.NotSet>.
